Preference.android:summary: The privacy friendly break reminder helps you to make more regularly breaks and to exercise and get fit!
You can work out at the breaks, but you don't have to! Just create a new profile and select no exercises to take a simple break.
Alternatively the break profiles and there exercises can be changed in the profile-settings
Pomodoro: Scientific studies have shown, that after a 30 minute work-time we start to lose concentration. To optimize your workflow take a 5 minute break every 30 minutes!

Basic Rest Activity Circle: Other scientific studies have shown, that after 70 minute of work most people have a down time of 20 minutes. To cut of this effect, try to make a 10 minute break after 60 minute of work, to be more efficient.

Preference.android:summery: The Privacy Friendly Break Reminder uses only the permission for vibration
